Dear Franks
Thank you for the kind words* I appreciate very much your
comment on the convention*
Our thanks go to you for your willingness to continue as
NAFB treasurer. We need somebody in that job who is steady, reliable,
and dependable and you*re the man! I, for one, should have been
terribly disappointed had you been unwilling to continue for another
year. I know the job is a bit onerous, but your help in it is so
important — the more so since so many of our members seem wonderful
at floating around in free balloons but not so good in meeting hard
cold facts such as bills!
I understand I’ll be seeing you in Chicago December h. So
long until then.
Burton Paulu
